containing_words.word: 内行看门道，外行看热闹

sentences.english: You won't signify in such a thing,he's the specialist.
sentences.chinese: 在这种专业上你别假充内行了，他才是专家。

sentences.english: Dilettante watch the scene of bustle, adept guard the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 外行看热闹，内行看门道。

sentences.english: Use the vendor for some hands-on training and mentoring to ramp up quickly.

sentences.english: Bankers start by counting notes and sales managers start with door-to-door selling.
